text: Tusim dekhade ho ki jinham lokam de dilam vica bimari hai, uha use de tarafa hi daura rahe hana. Iha kahide hana ki sanu saka hai ki kite asim kise musakala vica na phasa ja'i'e. Tam sabhava hai ki alaha jita pradana kara deve jam apane valom ko'i visesa gala pragata kara deve, tam iha loka usa biza la'i jisa nu iha apane dilam vica luko'i baithe hana, saramide honage
